00024 template <typename Operand, typename UnaryFunction>
00025 class UnaryOpIterator : public boost::iterator_adaptor<
00026     UnaryOpIterator<Operand,UnaryFunction>,
00027     typename ExpressionTraits<Operand>::Iterator,
00028     typename ExpressionTraits< UnaryOpExpression<Operand,UnaryFunction> >::Value,
00029     boost::use_default,
00030     typename ExpressionTraits< UnaryOpExpression<Operand,UnaryFunction> >::Reference
00031     > {
00032     typedef UnaryOpExpression<Operand,UnaryFunction> Operation;
00033 public:
00034     typedef typename ExpressionTraits<Operand>::Iterator BaseIterator;
00035     typedef typename ExpressionTraits<Operation>::Value Value;
00036     typedef typename ExpressionTraits<Operation>::Reference Reference;
00037 
00038     UnaryOpIterator() : UnaryOpIterator::iterator_adaptor_(), _functor() {}
00039 
00040     UnaryOpIterator(BaseIterator const & baseIter, UnaryFunction const & functor) :
00041         UnaryOpIterator::iterator_adaptor_(baseIter), _functor(functor) {}
00042 
00043     UnaryOpIterator(UnaryOpIterator const & other) :
00044         UnaryOpIterator::iterator_adaptor_(other), _functor(other._functor) {}
00045 
00046 private:
00047     friend class boost::iterator_core_access;
00048 
00049     Reference dereference() const {
00050         return vectorize(_functor,*this->base_reference());
00051     }
00052     
00053     UnaryFunction _functor;
00054 };

00063 template <typename Operand, typename UnaryFunction, int N>
00064 class UnaryOpExpression : public ExpressionBase< UnaryOpExpression<Operand,UnaryFunction,N> > {
00065     typedef UnaryOpExpression<Operand,UnaryFunction,N> Self;
00066 public:
00067     typedef typename ExpressionTraits<Self>::Element Element;
00068     typedef typename ExpressionTraits<Self>::ND ND;
00069     typedef typename ExpressionTraits<Self>::Iterator Iterator;
00070     typedef typename ExpressionTraits<Self>::Value Value;
00071     typedef typename ExpressionTraits<Self>::Reference Reference;
00072     typedef Vector<int,N> Index;
00073     
00074     UnaryOpExpression(Operand const & operand, UnaryFunction const & functor) :
00075         _operand(operand), _functor(functor) {}
00076 
00077     Reference operator[](int n) const {
00078         return Reference(_operand[n],_functor);
00079     }
00080 
00081     Iterator begin() const {
00082         return Iterator(_operand.begin(),_functor);
00083     }
00084 
00085     Iterator end() const {
00086         return Iterator(_operand.end(),_functor);
00087     }
00088 
00089     template <int P> int getSize() const {
00090         return _operand.template getSize<P>();
00091     }
00092 
00093     Index getShape() const {
00094         return _operand.getShape();
00095     }
00096 
00097     Operand _operand;
00098     UnaryFunction _functor;
00099 };
